A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
By far the worst starwars movie

As a standalone movie terrible. Via pacing\, plot holes\, shallow characters....

All the force awakens questions answered in the most blaa way possible (is Rey Luke's daughter\, is r a former pupil\, who is snoke\, who are Rey's parents\, what has Like been up too)

It literally feels like a slap in the face.

I'm the first 3-5 minutes something just felt off\, around the halfway point I considered walking out\, at the end I facepalmed myself in disbelief.

How they portrayed Luke\, super Leia\, pointless and irritating Rose\, unexplained and unwarranted powers of Rey\, the most pathetic space pursuit in history\, consistent breaking of lore and universe rules\, weird social justice warrior undertones\, I could go on and on.

An absolute travesty. Taking a massive dump over the whole brand. I will NEVER watch a starwars in the cinema again\, nor pay coin to watch.

Rogue one was awesome. This is horrendous.who on earth are these terrible directors.

Shame on Disney\, shame on the directors. But what I they care... Because dollars right :/
